name: soto nemuri
description:
soto nemuri (外眠り), a Yume Nikki/Touhou fangame, made in 96 hours by Aeon, Anumania, tami, brrdboy, and Aqwa for Touhou Fan Game Jam 8.
There is
Message Anumania#0261 if you have any trouble playing the game. We use a custom runner but the game will likely be playable using the default rpgmaker 2003 runner (also included).

The folder has a few files and programs, of which "_soto.exe" is the recommended runner. "_README.txt" is also helpful.

note: i accidentally deleted the zip i uploaded within the time limit so it looks like i cheated. i am sorry!
